struct context thread::registers [read]

The context of the thread.

Note: the context of the thread could include more than the accessible registers.

Definition at line 70 of file kernel.h.

Referenced by initialize().

int thread::owner

The index identifies the process that owns this thread.

The owner can be retrieved from the process_table by using the index.
